comments.text:
It would be helpful to have an option that opens the calendar in a new window -- sans the thunderbird icon toolbars and tabs -- just the File, Edit, View... and the calendar.  Basically, the SunBird layout.

Perhaps make this the default when right clicking on the calendar tab > Move to new window.  Or, give another option under "Move to New Window" --> "Full Screen Calendar".
